title: Can I use LoL Music for BG Music?
body:
This is more of a post hoping a Rioter could answer to see if I could use League of Legends music for background music for my YouTube and without getting copyright strikes, since I would like to start creating speedart videos [that some will be LoL related mainly chibis of champions and most being will be random stuff completely original and fanart], but they will be bland without any music in the background. Also a side question; Would Champions by Imagine Dragons be under copyright?

~ Stacona

replies.body:
Hey Stacona!

I'll just leave this here....

[Riot Games Legal Jibber Jabber](http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber)

So long as monetization is not enabled, you shouldn't have an issue. "Warriors" would be a copyrighted work, but since it continues to be freely and openly shared by the license holder, the same should apply.

This should not be taken as legal advice, but rather as a practical, common-sense answer to your question.
